title: Regal Silk Embroidered Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a luxurious pure silk midi dress with intricate floral embroidery, A-line silhouette, short flutter sleeves, sweetheart neckline, knee-length hem, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and delicate trims
techpack: Pure silk A-line midi dress with gold floral embroidery on bodice and hem, short flutter sleeves, sweetheart neckline, invisible side zipper closure, fully lined with silk, scalloped hem finish.
provenance: Designed by combining silk fabric with embroidery detailing inspired by traditional Indian craftsmanship.
design_text:
Regal Silk Embroidered Midi Dress (SLK-EMB-001)
Colors: deep royal blue, gold, ivory
Fabrics: silk
Prints/Patterns: floral embroidery
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short flutter sleeves
Neckline: sweetheart
Length: knee-length
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: gold thread embroidery, invisible side zipper, silk lining, scalloped hem
